transliteration_en: Alaaa innahum min ifkihim la yaqooloon
translation_en: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,
translation_id: Ingatlah, sesungguhnya mereka benar-benar mengatakan dengan kebohongan mereka,

translation_en: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.
translation_id: “Allah mempunyai anak.” Sesungguhnya mereka benar-benar pendusta.

translation_en: Has He chosen daughters over sons?
translation_id: Apakah Dia (Allah) lebih memilih anak-anak perempuan daripada anak-anak laki-laki?

translation_en: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?
translation_id: Apa yang telah terjadi pada kamu? Bagaimana kamu menetapkan(-nya)?

translation_en: Then will you not be reminded?
translation_id: Maka, mengapa kamu tidak mengambil pelajaran?

translation_en: Or do you have a clear authority?
translation_id: Ataukah kamu mempunyai bukti yang jelas?

transliteration_en: Faatoo bi Kitaabikum in kuntum saadiqeen
translation_en: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.
translation_id: (Kalau begitu,) bawalah kitabmu jika kamu orang-orang yang benar.

arabic: وَجَعَلُوْا بَيْنَهٗ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۗوَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ اِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُوْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Wa ja'aloo bainahoo wa bainal jinnati nasabaa; wa laqad 'alimatil jinnatu innahum lamuhdaroon
transliteration_id: Wa ja‘alū bainahū wa bainal-jinnati nasabā(n), wa laqad ‘alimatil-jinnatu innahum lamuḥḍarūn(a).
translation_en: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].
translation_id: Mereka menjadikan (hubungan) nasab antara Dia dan jin. Sungguh, jin benar-benar telah mengetahui bahwa mereka (kaum musyrik) pasti akan diseret (ke neraka),

translation_en: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,
translation_id: Maha Suci Allah dari apa yang mereka sifatkan,

translation_en: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].
translation_id: kecuali hamba-hamba Allah yang terpilih (karena keikhlasannya).

translation_en: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,
translation_id: Maka, sesungguhnya kamu dan apa yang kamu sembah itu

translation_en: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
translation_id: tidak akan dapat menyesatkan (seseorang) terhadap Allah,

translation_en: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.
translation_id: kecuali orang yang akan masuk ke (neraka) Jahim.

arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ اِلَّا لَهٗ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُوْمٌۙ
transliteration_en: Wa maa minnasa illaa lahoo maqaamum ma'loom
transliteration_id: Wa mā minnā illā lahū maqāmum ma‘lūm(un).
translation_en: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.
translation_id: (Malaikat berkata,) “Tidak satu pun di antara kami, kecuali masing-masing mempunyai kedudukan tertentu.

translation_en: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].
translation_id: Sesungguhnya kamilah yang selalu teratur dalam barisan (dalam melaksanakan perintah Allah).

translation_en: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."
translation_id: Sesungguhnya kamilah yang benar-benar terus bertasbih (kepada Allah).”

translation_en: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,
translation_id: Sesungguhnya mereka (orang kafir Makkah) benar-benar berkata,

arabic: لَوْ اَنَّ عِنْدَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ الْاَوَّلِيْنَۙ
translation_en: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,
translation_id: “Seandainya di sisi kami ada sebuah kitab dari (kitab-kitab yang diturunkan) kepada orang-orang terdahulu,

translation_en: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."
translation_id: niscaya kami akan menjadi hamba-hamba Allah yang terpilih.

translation_en: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.
translation_id: Akan tetapi, ternyata mereka mengingkarinya (Al-Qur’an). Maka, kelak mereka akan mengetahui (akibat keingkarannya itu).

transliteration_en: Wa laqad sabaqat Kalimatunaa li'ibaadinal mursa leen
translation_en: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,
translation_id: Sungguh, janji Kami benar-benar telah tetap bagi hamba-hamba Kami yang menjadi rasul.

translation_en: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory
translation_id: Sesungguhnya merekalah yang pasti akan mendapat pertolongan,

translation_en: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.
translation_id: dan sesungguhnya bala tentara Kami itulah yang pasti menang.

translation_en: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.
translation_id: Maka, berpalinglah engkau (Nabi Muhammad) dari mereka sampai waktu tertentu!

translation_en: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.
translation_id: Lihatlah mereka! Maka, kelak mereka akan melihat (azab itu).

translation_en: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?
translation_id: Maka, apakah mereka meminta agar azab Kami disegerakan?

arabic: فَاِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاۤءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنْذَرِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Fa izaa nazala bisaahatihim fasaaa'a sabaahul munzareen
transliteration_id: Fa iżā nazala bisāḥatihim fa sā'a ṣabāḥul-munżarīn(a).
translation_en: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.
translation_id: Apabila turun (siksaan itu) di halaman mereka, sangat buruklah pagi hari bagi orang-orang yang diperingatkan itu.

translation_en: And leave them for a time.
translation_id: Berpalinglah engkau (Nabi Muhammad) dari mereka sampai waktu tertentu.

translation_en: And see, for they are going to see.
translation_id: Lihatlah (mereka)! Maka, kelak mereka akan melihat (azab itu).

arabic: سُبْحٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُوْنَۚ
translation_en: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
translation_id: Maha Suci Tuhanmu, Tuhan pemilik kemuliaan dari apa yang mereka sifatkan.

translation_en: And peace upon the messengers.
translation_id: Selamat sejahtera bagi para rasul.

translation_en: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
translation_id: Segala puji bagi Allah, Tuhan semesta alam.
